attributes.action: Close schools in Manchester due to the spread of the Coronavirus
attributes.additional_details:
Closing schools down is necessary.
Manchester does not have a lot of cases, but we feel that it soon will if no action is taken in the near future. closing down schools will will be able to control how fast the virus is spreading.
attributes.background: Close schools down in Manchester before the virus starts spreading rapidly in Manchester.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300403

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
